name: Coffree
description: Coffree is a beautiful, lightweight theme built with Bootstrap that is a great starting point for using LemonStand's built in subscriptions feature to offer recurring billing plans to your retail customers. Offer a mix of one time purchases and subscriptions and manage all of your products, plans, customers and orders from a single management panel.
author: LemonStand <support@lemonstand.com> (http://docs.lemonstand.com)
